properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee every hour, most gracious Lord; No tender voice like Thine can peace afford.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee, O I need Thee; Every hour I need Thee; O bless me now, my Savior, I come to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee every hour, stay Thou nearby; Temptations lose their power when Thou art nigh.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee every hour, in joy or pain; Come quickly and come to Thee abide, or life is in vain.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee every hour; teach me Thy will; And Thy rich promises in me fulfill.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need Thee every hour, most Holy One; O make me Thine indeed, Thou blessed Son.{/lang-eng}
